entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Island Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -27.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Island Lake Airport 11:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -27.0°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -30.0°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:15 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:15 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:15 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
